tools.name: check_railway_status
tools.description: Verify API access and authentication. Returns the current user's information if authenticated.

tools.name: list_projects
tools.description: List all accessible Railway projects with their environments and services.

tools.name: create_project_and_link
tools.description: Create a new Railway project with optional description and default environment name.

arguments.name: default_environment_name
arguments.description: Name for the default environment (defaults to 'production')

tools.name: list_services
tools.description: List services in a Railway project.

tools.name: deploy
tools.description: Trigger deployment for a service in a specific environment.

tools.name: list_deployments
tools.description: List deployments for a service with status and metadata.

arguments.name: limit
arguments.description: Maximum number of deployments to return (default: 10)

tools.name: get_logs
tools.description: Retrieve build or deployment logs for a specific deployment.

arguments.name: log_type
arguments.description: Type of logs to retrieve ('build' or 'deployment')

tools.name: list_environments
tools.description: List environments in a Railway project.

tools.name: create_environment
tools.description: Create a new environment in a Railway project.

tools.name: list_variables
tools.description: List environment variables for a project, environment, or service. Values are masked by default for security.

arguments.name: include_values
arguments.description: If true, return actual values; if false, return masked values (default: false)

tools.name: set_variables
tools.description: Set environment variables for a project, environment, or service.

arguments.name: variables
arguments.description: Dictionary of variable names and values to set

tools.name: generate_domain
tools.description: Generate a railway.app domain for a service.

tools.name: deploy_template
tools.description: Deploy from Railway Template Library (e.g., redis, postgres, mysql).

tools.name: list_templates
tools.description: List available templates from Railway Template Library.

arguments.name: limit
arguments.description: Maximum number of templates to return (default: 50)

tools.name: get_template
tools.description: Get template details including services configuration.
